title: Моє кіно
overview: The main character, Sasha, is a master confectioner. Her ex-husband Danya is a talented screenwriter. They were a very beautiful couple, but they couldn't get over their loss together, and it destroyed their marriage. Danya is considered missing during a volunteer trip to the front. Sasha's cafe was destroyed by fragments of a Russian rocket. The girl has no money for repairs, so she decides to accept the offer of the producer of the TV channel, for which her ex-husband wrote the script, and finish the job. Moreover, according to the documents, Sasha is a legal co-author of Dana. The main character finds her husband's laptop and his notes about their life together, about which he dreamed of making a film. The girl begins to understand how different everything in their relationship was than it seemed to her. So her past pain turns into lines of the script of a new love story.
